column5: Hi All,  I was beginning to go a bit stir crazy up here...has been 2 weeks since i got out. Despite the lack of fish on Lac Seul this trip, it was still an awesome day off in beautiful NW Ontario....just what my soul needed.   I DECIDED TO TRY OUT MY UNDERWATER CAMERA HOUSING TODAY TOO....LOL....WITH MIXED RESULTS....BUT ITS A START!                     <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/9s94EtV1daQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>     JUST AFTER TAKING THOSE SHOTS OF MY NEW GADGET, I NOTICED THE BAMBIS FEEDING WITH MUM OUTSIDE, ALWAYS COOL TO SEE.       FALL IS DEFINITELY HERE, THE CHICKENS WERE EVERYWHERE ON THE TRIP UP.         THE WIND HAD JUST STARTED TO PICK UP (CONTRARY TO THE WEATHER REPORT...SURPRISE SURPRISE) AS I ARRIVED AT THE LANDING.       I DECIDED TO TRY TROLLING CRANKS AFTER SEEING LOTS OF REPORTS ABOUT IT, NO LUCK, BUT NICE DAY TO CRUISE ABOUT FOR A COUPLE HOURS.        AFTER A WHOLE SERIES OF ISSUES THAT PUT A DENT IN MY INTENDED PLANS, I MANAGED ONLY 2 MORE WALLEYE (SMALL). BUT SOME NICE SIZED SMALLIES MADE UP FOR THAT.          GOT BACK TO THE LANDING AT DUSK...ONLY ONE OTHER CREATURE THERE, NOT LONG BEFORE HE'S GONE SOUTH NOW.         HERE IS THE VIDEO FROM THE DAY  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/idf0ZRC7E9E" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Fantastic report and VERY cool underwater shots and video!  Bet those chickens are cursing the fact they cant fly....LOL.
Awesome report Limey! Im still jealous of where you live
nice pics and report !!! nice pic of that sauger ...cheers
Nice! Those birds make me want to out out hunting!
Great bunch of pictures Simon, specially the deer by the lake !!
Nice going Simon Looking forward to some fall fishing myself.
Great video!  Step on the gas next time and you'll have surf and turf!! Grouse be considered turf??
I take your traffic back up any day over the mine in the Big Smoke. Nice report Simon, looking forward to more of that underwater footage.
